column1: The University of Vassouras (Portuguese: Universidade de Vassouras)
column2: also known as Severino Sombra University
column3: is a private university in Brazil
column4: located in the city of Vassouras
column5: in the state of Rio de Janeiro. It was founded on January 29

column1: For undergraduate admission to USS two exams are used: ENEM and its own vestibular test.
